title: Example Title

title: Murmurer
description: Post and answer at least 5 tickets.

title: Loud Mouth

title: Know-it-all

title: Response Guru

title: Bug Finder
badgeDescription: Solve at least 10 'bug related' tickets.

title: Security Defender
badgeDescription: Solve any 'security' related ticket.

title: Computer Tamer
badgeDescription: Solve any 'crash' related ticket.

title: Lightning Ideas
badgeDescription: Respond to a ticket in no longer than 20 minutes of it's posted time.

title: Project Manager
badgeDescription: Suggest a solution that solves a 'group project' related ticket.

title: Networker
badgeDescription: Solve at lest 5 tickets realted to any connection based problem.

title: Phone App Slinger
badgeDescription: Solve any 10 iOS, Android, Kotlin, XTML, Swift or any other phone app related tickets.

title: Book-Bot
badgeDescription: Resolve at least 50 tickets.

title: Syntax Genius
badgeDescription: Solve 20 syntax issues found in tickets.

title: Wireframer
badgeDescription: Correct 25 CSS, SCSS or any other layout/sty;e related tickets.

title: Team Player
badgeDescription: Solve any 15 tickets from the same year as yourself.
